title: What are the best online courses? What makes them great? - Quora

response.answer_text: With the growth of digitalisation in the world and the global pandemic, studies have gone totally online now a days. People are thinking a thousand times before stepping feet outside. Due to this, no one wants that they remain unskilled. So, people are thinking of upskilling themselves in these trying times. After all who wants to sit idle at home. It's better that people invest their time in learning new things. Due to this reason, Globsyn Business School, a renowned and reputed business school situated in Kolkata, has launched their online learning platform in the name Globsyn Business School Online (GBS Online) to provide online certification courses to the students on India as well as other nations. The best part is AICTE itself recognized this course and listed on their website because of the low prices of this course and world-class study materials they are providing, which are written by the help of their esteemed professors. GBS Online is providing various courses such as Digital Marketing, Financial Markets and Investments, Product and Brand Management, Industry 4.0, Performance Management and Competency Mapping, How to Learn Online, and others. All the courses cost just INR 99 each. The course became so much popular that not only students, but teachers, professors, and working professionals from various institutions have joined this course to upgrade their skills. This created so much craze during the lockdown that more than 34,000 people from all over the country as well from different parts of world enrolled themselves to be a part of this esteemed institution. To let you know, Globsyn Business School is the only institute in Eastern India who has partnered with the reputed Harvard Business School to provide the world-standard curriculum in their B-School. This is itself an achievement in the industry of Management Education, which makes these online courses great.

The best online courses are produced when the teacher has carefully planned the lesson, used good quality camera and sound equipment, enunciates and includes online learning trends such as gamification and personalisation. This is including games or quizzes for students to enjoy in their lessons or tailoring the class to suit the needs and interests of the student. The best online classes are also relatively short in duration. Typically, a class should last 15-30 minutes. This is known as microlearning, a trend which can improve our retention rates and depth of understanding. All in all, I believe the best online classes equip the learner with a tool or a new skill which they can apply themselves. Whether it is a watercolouring class that teaches students a particular technique that they can apply to their own design or a cooking class that allows students to cook the perfect meal for their family. If a student gains a skill from the class that they can use for their own benefit and they enjoy doing so, I believe it is a great online class.
